name: Witch Rune
description:
You are a witch trapped and interrogated by an inquisitor on a cucking stool. Cast a sorcery by creating runes, while try to correctly answer the priest's questions, to brutally take your revenge.

Duration: 10 minutes

Game by: Giacomo Giunti, Angelo Passalacqua, Gildo Di Marino

Attention

Not all keyboards support pressing multiple keys simultaneously, this will make the game unplayable. Sorry, but that's one of the game core mechanic :(
